description: This file contains template functions for creating and destroying instances of the ProcStatmS class, including conditional memory management. It includes standard and custom memory handling mechanisms and references external classes and interfaces related to memory partitioning.

classes.name: ProcStatmS
classes.description: The class involved in resource statistics management, instantiated through template functions.

methods.name: create<ProcStatmS>
methods.description: Factory function to create a ProcStatmS object, optionally using custom memory allocation.

methods.name: destroy<ProcStatmS>
methods.description: Function to destroy a ProcStatmS object, with conditional deallocation based on custom memory management.
